item.description:
We had a very successful help2learn chinese meetup, 9 people showed up.
Thank you very much !! Everyone enjoyed each other, even one of us couldn't speak any Chinese at all. The rule was anything spoken in Chinese need to be repeated in English, so no one was left out ! Of course, once we get the conversation going, everything else will fall in place eventually ;)

Hope to see you there !

Best Regards,
Edwin
item.name: Help2LearnChinese October Meetup
